thread.title: Teach students the greatness of Hindu kings! - Mahant Arun Dasji Maharaj, Jagannath Dham Shibir
thread.title_full: Teach students the greatness of Hindu kings! - Mahant Arun Dasji Maharaj, Jagannath Dham Shibir

author: Hindu Janajagruti Samiti
title: Teach students the greatness of Hindu kings! - Mahant Arun Dasji Maharaj, Jagannath Dham Shibir
text:
Teach students the greatness of Hindu kings! – Mahant Arun Dasji Maharaj, Jagannath Dham Shibir February 20, 2025 Share On : Sadguru Dr Charudatta Pingale presenting Mahant Arun Dasji Maharaj (left) a brochure on Hindu Janajagruti Samiti Prayagraj – Students today are being taught that ‘Akbar was great’. Akbar destroyed Hindu temples and committed atrocities on Hindu women. Instead, students should be taught of the greatness of Hindu Kings asserted Mahant Arun Dasji Maharaj of Jagannath Dham Shibir, successor of Jagadguru Shri Ramanandacharya Swami Hansdevacharyaji Maharaj. Sadguru Dr Charudatta Pingale recently called upon Maharaj. Maharaj also praised the work of the Hindu Janajagruti Samiti, saying that it is working to mould the youth in a good way.
Tags : Blessings of Saints Hindu Janajagruti Samiti HJS in Kumbh Mela Related News HJS’s appeal to the Government to make the film ‘Chhaava’ tax-free! February 18, 2025
